result.ga: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatach
result.orig: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatach
result.html: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatachYou're as black as smoke.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú ċoṁ duḃ le deataċYou're as black as smoke.

result.ga: Is maith liom an chulaith dhubh
result.orig: Is maith liom an chulaith dhubh
result.html: Is maith liom an chulaith dhubhI like the black suit.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom an ċulaiṫ ḋuḃI like the black suit.

result.eng: The black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.
result.ga: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainne
result.orig: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainne
result.html: Bhí dreach gruama dorcha ar an fharraige ag na néalta dubha fearthainneThe black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dreaċ gruama dorċa ar an ḟarraige ag na néalta duḃa fearṫainneThe black rain clouds made the sea look gloomy and dark.

result.eng: While there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...
result.ga: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-EabhracWhile there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...
result.ponchtml: Agus scamaill duḃa ag plúċaḋ amaċ as na túir i Nua-EaḃracWhile there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...

result.eng: Tall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
result.ga: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéir
result.orig: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéir
result.html: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéirTall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
result.ponchtml: Simléirí arda duḃa ag teilgean toite sa spéirTall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.orig: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.html: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ an tsaoil aige do Ṁiċeál Duḃ agus don ḃail a ċuir an ḃantraċt airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
